item.description:
Please join the Red Sox Natives at 7pm on Friday, April 29 at Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grille in Woburn to watch the Red Sox play the Seattle Mariners at 7:10 pm and stay for the Rock and Country Spring Bash with live music from the Herland Brothers. 

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

There is a Cash Bar.

If enough Natives RSVP Lauren will set aside a reserved table or section for the Natives and offer you some complimentary wings and treats. So Please RSVP. 

Hang out for dinner, drinks and dancing with live music provided by the Herland Brothers at Scoreboard's Rock and Country Spring Bash http://www.herlandbrothers.com

SCOREBOARD WILL BE PACKED AFTER 8 PM SO ARRIVE EARLY and avoid standing outside in a long line!

Please remember to maintain your own food and bar tab and tip your servers. 

Join us early or later. Wear your best Sox gear. Bring cool guests and friends.

There is no cover, however please RSVP here and update so we can give Scoreboard a number of atendees on Thursday night.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to our section. .
item.why: The Red Sox will return home playing well, the Herland Brothers are performing, ScoreBoard events have been well received and Lauren keeps inviting us back
item.name: Watch Red Sox vs Seattle &Rock & Country Spring Bash with The Herland Brothers
